definition[0]: a large object such as a silver cup or plate that someone receives as a prize for winning a competition
note[0]: Football League/Masters/Heisman etc Trophy (=the name given to a particular competition for which the prize is a trophy)
example[0]: walls lined with banners and athletic trophies
definition[1]: something that you keep to prove your success in something, especially in war or hunting
example[1]: A lionâ€™s head was among the trophies of his African trip.
